description: A zip-in power skirt to create a full seal between your ski/snowboard jacket and pants.<br><br>The ski/snowboard zip-seal addition can be zipped between your Norrøna ski/snowboard jackets and pants to create a full seal stopping snow and wind from entering.<br><br>They use a durable flex1 stretch fabric for this bib because it offers flexibility in size, durability, breathability, snow and wind protection.<br><br>The fabric is a recycled 85% nylon and 15% Elastane (BLUESIGN approved) 163 g/m2, to make this bib durable and flexible enough to not stand in the way of your mobility.<br><br>This zip-seal has a relaxed fit, like their powder skirts.
name: Ski/Snowboard Zip-Seal - Mens
